QuestData.Title: Shredder vs. Saberon
QuestData.Description: After the saberon stole from these plants, they were forced further up Steamscar Rise and barricaded themselves in. I could not find a way to get in but you have the solution.$b$bOne path is blocked by a tangle of hard vines. I have heard you have a machine that could cut through that with ease.$b$bI would get on a shredder and take those vines down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Break the vine barrier using your shredder.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, but we need to move quickly before the plants realize the way is open...

Objectives.Objective: Shred the vine barrier and enter the saberon camp
